items.basicinformationcomments: All charges shall be five (5) percent more per service outside the corporate limits of the City of Springfield, Missouri.
items.description:
Under this Rider A, City Utilities will provide the customer with electric service from a second independent source. The second source can be either from a second feeder of the same substation or from a feeder of a different substation, however, the first and second source must have a common metering point with one meter. Line construction, if any, is subject to the Extension Policy.
Service under this rider shall be available within the corporate limits of the City of Springfield, Missouri, and the adjacent territory served by City Utilities for commercial and industrial customers with monthly demands of 300 kilowatts or greater. Charges for service under this rider shall be in addition to charges for service under other applicable electric service rates.
items.label: 539fb3dcec4f024bc1dbe2d1
items.name: Dual Electric Feed second source from different substation
